page.title: 05A Day In My Life
page.content: On a Friday I get up as usual and go to school.School starts at 9.00am and finishes at 3.30pm for juniors.We start the morning with prayers taken by Rev.S. Frost the local rector.At break we go swimming for an hour.The best swimmers have a chance to do awards.We then come back in time for dinner.Infants dine at 12.00 while juniors play outside.After dinner we do Maths or Language work.In the summer term the girls have dancing and the boys do either Athletics or Art and Craft.Sometimes a team of girls dance at the Castle Fayre.My mum meets me after school and takes me home.On the last Friday in the month there is a disco in the Community Centre which I usually support. Sally Jones Age 10
